meanings.sent1: She rerepeats the same story every time we meet.
meanings.sent2: He rerepeats his favorite joke at every family gathering.
meanings.sent3: The parrot rerepeats the words it hears, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: His actions rerepeat the mistakes of his past.
meanings.sent5: The echo in the canyon rerepeats his shout, fading into the distance.

meanings.sent1: The pattern rerepeats every few minutes.
meanings.sent2: History often rerepeats itself, teaching us valuable lessons.
meanings.sent3: The melody rerepeats in my mind, like a catchy tune.
meanings.sent4: The seasons rerepeat their cycle, bringing change and renewal.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock rerepeats its shrill sound, waking me up each morning.

meanings.sent1: She rerepeats the document for each team member.
meanings.sent2: The artist rerepeats the painting to sell multiple copies.
meanings.sent3: The photocopier rerepeats the image with precision.
meanings.sent4: The machine rerepeats the process flawlessly, ensuring accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The printer rerepeats the text on each page, creating identical copies.
